DATETIME_COLUMN.description: Specifies the date/time column in the AMI file.

ID_COLUMN.description: Specifies the id column in the AMI file.

DATA_COLUMN.description: Specifies the data column in the AMI file.

TIMEZONE_COLUMN.description: Specifies the timezone column in the AMI file.

FILL_METHOD.description: Specifies the fill method for missing data. Valid values are 'bfill', 'backfill', 'pad', 'ffill'.

RESAMPLE.description: Specifies resample method to use. Valid methods include all DataFrame aggregators.

AGGREGATION.description: Group aggregation method. Valid methods include all DataFrame aggregators.

GROUP_COUNT.description: Grouping count. Must be a positive number (REQUIRED).

LOADSHAPES_CSV.description: Specifies the loadshape file to generate.

GROUPS_CSV.description: Specifies the group file to generate.

SCALING.description: may be 'energy', 'power', or leave field empty for both.

OUTPUT_PNG.description: Specifies the output PNG file name.

PNG_FIGSIZE.description: Specifies the output PNG image size (in inches)

PNG_FONTSIZE.description: Specifies the output PNG image font size (in points)

CLOCK_GLM.description: Specifies the output GLM clock model fragment.

LOADS_GLM.description: Specifies the output GLM load model fragment.

SCHEDULES_GLM.description: Specifies the output GLM schedule model fragment.

LOAD_SCALE.description: Specifies the scaling of the schedule data to load (e.g., 1kVA=1000VA)
